tutorials.title: Welcome to MG space..!
tutorials.description: This is the landing page for my personal space MG.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: MG Library
tutorials.description: Contains a list of topics developed from notes on specific areas. These notes converge from various sources, for example discussions, trainings, experiments, mistakes, and failures.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Access VM and Configure VNC
tutorials.description: How to access the VM and configure the VNC.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Oracle Database Gold Image
tutorials.description: Pre-installation setup and post installation tasks for Oracle Database gold image. It also discusses the steps to deinstall Oracle Database and some troubleshooting scenarios and tips.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Install Oracle EMCC
tutorials.description: How to install Oracle EMCC on VM. It also discusses the pre-installation setup, troubleshooting tips, and the steps to deinstall EMCC.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Compute Instance and Custom Images
tutorials.description: How to create and manage compute instances and custom images in the OCI tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab #: Fun with Git-Bits
tutorials.description: The information in this lab revolves around github, git desktop, git bash.

tutorials.title: Lab #: GitHub PRs
tutorials.description: History of pull and merge requests for DBA Essentials workshops committed to OLL master on Github.
